original_text:
You love evil more than good,
    and lying more than speaking what is right. Selah
korean_text: 네가 선보다 악을 사랑하며 의를 말함보다 거짓을 사랑하는도다 (셀라)

sentences.original_text: You love evil more than good
and lying more than speaking what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 의를 말하는 것보다 거짓을 더 사랑하나니
